cst8284.triviatime

类 Controls

  • java.lang.Object
    • cst8284.triviatime.Controls

  • public class Controls
extends java.lang.Object
    contains static methods related mostly to the menus, as well as the "Next Question" button that appears in the bottom right corner of the display when the questions are loaded.
    从以下版本开始:
    jdk1.8.0_161
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Roger Li
    另请参阅:
    Collections, Comparator, Platform, ActionEvent, EventHandler, Insets, Pos, Alert, Alert.AlertType, Button, Label, Menu, MenuBar, MenuItem, KeyCode, KeyCodeCombination, KeyCombination, BorderPane, HBox, VBox, Color, Stage

    • 字段概要

      字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明

      The sequence number of questions, start from 0.
      private static javafx.scene.control.Menu mnu
      A Menu contains multiple MenuItem objects.
      private static javafx.scene.control.MenuItem mnuItm
      A MenuItem stores actions by clicking it.
      private static javafx.stage.Stage stage
      primary stage showing onto the screen.

      • mnuItm

        private static javafx.scene.control.MenuItem mnuItm
        A MenuItem stores actions by clicking it.

      • mnu

        private static javafx.scene.control.Menu mnu
        A Menu contains multiple MenuItem objects.

      • stage

        primary stage showing onto the screen.

        The sequence number of questions, start from 0.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Controls

    • 方法详细资料

      • getMenuBar

        public static javafx.scene.control.MenuBar getMenuBar(javafx.stage.Stage stage)
        Generates a menu bar with 3 menus showing at the top of the stage. Each menu includes several menu items each of which implements a action.
        参数:
        stage - - the stage that MenuBars being loaded and displayed onto.
        返回:
        A MenuBar includes instantiated Menu objects.

      • getMenu

        private static javafx.scene.control.Menu getMenu(java.lang.String mnuName,
                                                 java.lang.String acKey)
        Returns a Menu with the name and a accelerate key.
        参数:
        mnuName - - The name of the Menu object
        acKey - - The accelerate key to activate the Menu object
        返回:
        The Menu object defined with name and accelerate key.

      • getMnuItm

        private static javafx.scene.control.MenuItem getMnuItm(java.lang.String mnuItmName,
                                                       java.lang.String acKey,
                                                       javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> e)
        Returns a MenuItem with its name, accelerate key and the tasks it takes.
        参数:
        mnuItmName - - The name of the MenuItem object
        acKey - - The accelerate key to activate the MenuItem object
        e - - The container where actions are included in
        返回:
        The MenuItem object defined with name, accelerate key and actions.

      • reloadGame

        private static void reloadGame()
        This method load a new QAPane to the primary stage, which includes a new array of QA and reset all the scores. It makes the game start over.

      • setStage

        private static void setStage(javafx.stage.Stage s)
        Change the primary stage shown on the screen
        参数:
        s - - the stage that set to show onto the screen

      • getStage

        public static javafx.stage.Stage getStage()
        Returns the current stage showing to the screen
        返回:
        the current stage

      • getRP

        public static javafx.scene.layout.BorderPane getRP()
        Returns the root pane on current stage.
        返回:
        the border pane currently set on the stage

      • getNextQuestionPane

        public static javafx.scene.layout.HBox getNextQuestionPane()
        Returns a HBox contains the button activating the next question and recording the result info into a VBox to be shown after answering all the questions
        返回:
        a HBox contains the button of activating next question.
